page.title: 11AN OLD PERSON IN WOOTTON
page.content: An old age pensioner told us: I enjoy residing in Wootton because the country is nice and quiet,an ideal place for retirement.The roads could be improved and there could be a few more pavements because the roads are very dangerous to walk along.Also some more bus shelters and some street lights could improve things. The people are very friendly in Wootton.The road is very untidy in the summer, strewn with holidaymakers litter.There is a mobile library which visits weekly that the older population can use.There is very little vandalism in Wootton and the young are well behaved generally.There is a 50 plus club for the local community,and there is also a youth club at Lakeside Holiday Camp.
